alert.note: Alert for Cochise; Graham (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 24 at 3:39PM MST until July 24 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Dust Advisory for... South central Graham County in southeastern Arizona... Northeastern Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 445 PM MST. * At 338 PM MST, a dust channel was 12 miles east of Bowie, or 17 miles west of Steins, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 358 and 391. Locations impacted include... Bowie and San Simon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
